description.displayText:
Paulette is AMAZING and was one of 5 caregivers I hired to take care of my best friend before she passed away last year. 

She was one of the first caregivers I hired and did such a great job that I had her help train some of the other caregivers from an actual agency. Was thankful and blessed to have them all work well together as a team because of Paulette's attention to detail. 

Paulette worked really hard and was available anytime I needed her. She became like family towards the end and took care of my friend as if she were her own family. 

She is a kind, genuine, trustworthy and dependable person who would be an asset to any family. I have and will continue to recommend her to anyone in need of a wonderful caregiver!!!

description.displayText: I hired her to care for my grandmother who has dementia so that I could host my daughter's birthday at another location. She confirmed the date and time on the same day and 5 minutes before she was supposed to be there she said she had a flat tire. I asked her how far away she was and she said 30 minutes. She then called back and said she doesn't do one-time care and she thought it was just an interview. My daughter's birthday party was ruined.

description.displayText: Paulette is very knowledgeable and kind.  She treated my mother in law as though she were her own mother.  I trust Paulette wholeheartedly.  I've told my family that If I ever need the assistance of a personal care giver, they are to find Paulette!  It's really difficult to put into words just how comforting it was to us to know that our family member was in such good hands.  My only regret is that we didn't find Paulette sooner.
